text: 🚨 Energy alert! 🚨 The EU is warning of a possible winter energy price hike due to the end of the Russia-Ukraine gas deal. 💰🔋 Germany, Italy, and Turkey could potentially swap Russian imports for other supplies, but a recent tax on gas exports from Berlin is making it complicated. 🇩🇪💸 The tax is reducing incentives for energy firms in central Europe to invest in non-Russian gas supplies. 🛑️ Germany's neighbors are now pushing to discuss the measure at the upcoming EU energy ministers meeting in Brussels on Monday. 📣🇪🇺 What are your thoughts on this? Let's discuss! 💬
